info.title: Journal Entry (Cost Controlling) - Read, Create
info.description: This service enables you to read, create, and reverse journal entries related to cost controlling. You can reassign a high volume of primary and secondary costs and revenues when the allocation is incorrect.

x-sap-shortText: Read, create, and reverse cost controlling journal entries using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Reassign Costs and Revenues Integration(SAP_COM_0754)

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Accounting: Coding Block (FINS_CODING_BLOCK)
* Accounting: Market Segment (FINS_MARKET_SEGMENT)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

parameters.name: FiscalYear
parameters.description:
Fiscal Year  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ReferenceDocument
parameters.description:
Reference Document  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ControllingArea
parameters.description:
Controlling Area  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: DocumentDate
parameters.description:
Document Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: PostingDate
parameters.description:
Posting Date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

parameters.name: FiscalPeriod
parameters.description:
Fiscal Period  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: AccountingDocumentHeaderText
parameters.description:
Document Header Text  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: WarningsAreIgnored
parameters.description:
Ignore warning  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
